document_data.name: Helm at Highsun
document_data.mainbody: The '''Helm at Highsun''' was a tavern in the town of [[Red Larch]] owned by a [[mage]] named [[Yather Indaglol]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Interior:
{{quote|No one bothers you at the Helm.|}}
The tavern was shadowy and quiet. Most customers were caravan guards, adventurers, retired people, merchants looking for relaxation, and people who just wanted to be alone.
document_data.Staff: The motto of the Helm at Highsun was enforced by a silent, attentive, and menacing [[helmed horror]] that was under the mental control of Indaglol. The horror was known as [[Araldyk]], and served as waiter, usher, bouncer, and sometimes a cloak rack.
